class.name: BasicParticleKit
class.description: A [BulletKit](https://github.com/PickledCow/STGodot-4/wiki/BulletKit) for basic particles. BasicParticleKits are a super basic implementation of [BulletKits](https://github.com/PickledCow/STGodot-4/wiki/BulletKit) for use in collisionless, short-lived bullets. Example use-cases are for graze-particles and item collection text.
